text: The 1932 Rice Owls football team was an American football team that represented Rice University as a member of the Southwest Conference (SWC) during the 1932 college football season. In its fourth season under head coach Jack Meagher, the team compiled a 7–3 record (3–3 against SWC opponents) and was outscored by a total of 141 to 77. ==Schedule== ==References== Rice Category:Rice Owls football seasons Rice
title: 1932 Rice Owls football team
